mapper.select: select auditingSeq,auditingTrans,auditingName,auditingData,promoterSeq,promoter,auditPersonSeq,auditPerson,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, state,remarks FROM Auditing WHERE auditPersonSeq = #{auditPersonSeq} and state = 'I' ORDER BY createTime DESC

select auditingSeq,auditingTrans,auditingName,auditingData,promoterSeq,promoter,auditPersonSeq,auditPerson,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, state,remarks FROM Auditing WHERE auditPersonSeq = #{auditPersonSeq} and state in ('F','S') ORDER BY createTime DESC
